    • Method Detail

      • findBusinessSeat

        public Seat findBusinessSeat(char seatPref)
        Returns Seat instance of the first found seat for the request. This searches for the first seat available in the compartment based upon the seat preference.
        Parameters:
        seatPref - type of seat preference

      • findBusinessRowForGroup

        public int findBusinessRowForGroup(int num,
                          java.util.Queue<java.lang.String> names)
        Returns number of passengers left from the group who were not seated. This searches for the first open row containing the most seats available for group reservation.
        Parameters:
        num - number of passengers requesting a seat
        names - names of passengers trying to request a seat
